2.1.1. Lab – Access Guided Configuration¶

The first step in deploying an API protection profile is accessing the guided configuration

2.1.1.1. Task – Access the API Protection Guided Configuration¶

  1. From the webbrowser, click on the Access tab located on the lefthand side.

  1. Click Guided Configuration

  1. Click API Protection

  1. Click API Protection Proxy

  1. Click Next

Note

BLAH BLAH Different topologies for API Protection.
